fields.headline: Pick of the week: Comedy
fields.bodyText: Pappy's Fun Club: Funergy Pleasance Courtyard, Edinburgh Saturday 2 to Friday 7 The Brummie foursome bring startling sketches. Glenn Wool: Goodbye Scars Underbelly, Glasgow Saturday 2 to Friday 7 Incisive mix of comedic philosophy and meaningful observations. John Gordillo: Divide And Conga Pleasance Dome, Edinburgh Saturday 2 to Friday 7 The cerebral former RDA host presents his new solo show. Daniel Kitson: 66a Church Road Traverse Theatre, Edinburgh Tuesday 5 to Friday 7 An ode to the beloved flat that Kitson had to move out of.
